properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. F/V GUMA, FOUR PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED
   AND ADRIFT IN 27-58S 046-45W ON 23 SEP.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
   LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
   ANY COASTAL RADIO STATION.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2944/17.
